pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Peaks-over-Threshold Modelling for Spatial Extreme Events // Tools for high-dimensional peaks-over-threshold inference and simulation of spatial extremal processes. Key references include de Fondeville and Davison (2018) doi:10.1093/biomet/asy026, Thibaud and Opitz (2015) doi:10.1093/biomet/asv045, Wadsworth and Tawn doi:10.1093/biomet/ast042.
